description: Arsenal transfer rumours: Dusan Vlahovic, Evan Ndicka
title: Arsenal transfer rumours: Dusan Vlahovic, Evan Ndicka
title_page: Arsenal transfer rumours: Dusan Vlahovic, Evan Ndicka  - BBC Sport
maintext:
Arsenal, Newcastle, Chelsea and Manchester United are keen on Serbia striker Dusan Vlahovic, with the 25-year-old set to leave Juventus this summer. (Gazzetta dello Sport- in Italian), external
The Gunners, Newcastle and Nottingham Forest are among the clubs interested in Roma's 25-year-old Ivory Coast defender Evan Ndicka, who is rated at 40m euros (Â£33.4m). (Caught Offside), external
